text:
Education: BS Computer Science @ top 25 CS school
Years of Experience: No fulltime experience, only internships
Prior Experience: 1 startup, 1 Facebook (internships)
Company: Google
Title/Level: SWE II (L3)
Location: Seattle
Salary: 108k
Relocation/Signing Bonus: relocation 10.5k, signing 80k
Stock bonus: 170k/4
Bonus: 15% bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 257k year 1 (247k excluding relo); 167k after
Other details: Picked Google! Excited as it is in a product area I use, and am quite excited about.
